title: UTXO Model
content:
- ### OntologyBlock
  id:: utxo-model-ontology
  collapsed:: true
	- ontology:: true
	- term-id:: BC-0007
	- preferred-term:: UTXO Model
	- status:: complete
	- public-access:: true
	- definition:: Unspent Transaction Output accounting model within blockchain systems, providing essential functionality for distributed ledger technology operations and properties.
	- source:: [[ISO/IEC 23257:2021]], [[IEEE 2418.1]], [[NIST NISTIR]]
	- maturity:: mature
	- owl:class:: bc:UTXOModel
	- owl:physicality:: VirtualEntity
	- owl:role:: Object
	- owl:inferred-class:: bc:VirtualObject
	- belongsToDomain:: [[BlockchainDomain]]
	- #### Relationships
	  id:: utxo-model-relationships
	  collapsed:: true
		- is-subclass-of:: [[Transaction]]
		- bridges-to:: [[Distributeddatastructure]]
		- bridges-to:: [[BlockchainEntity]]
		- bridges-from:: [[Bitcoin]]

ontology.definition: Unspent Transaction Output accounting model within blockchain systems, providing essential functionality for distributed ledger technology operations and properties.
